title: "game has crashed, Please try to reconnect to the game" PLEASE HELP
body: I finished a game as a pantheon {{champion:80}} , and after it had ended (we surrendered) loading the endgame lobby was taking a while, so i pressed the 'Skip waiting for stats' button. My league was acting laggy after that, so i closed it and opened it again. It came up with the "you have left a game in progress, please try to reconnect"  alert. Then the real problems started. Here are some screenshots of the alerts i was getting. If i pressed the 'reconnect' button on any of them, the screen goes black for a while then the error alerts come up. If i try to close my league client, I get the time penalty thing. I have tried restarting my league, but it just continues with the problem. Ended the task on the task manager and the same thing happened. Plz help, i really want to keep playing.

replies.body: i got same problem! PLz help

Hey there,

This issue should've resolved itself by now, these are known as ghost games and can occur when your client/the server doesn't get told a game has ended correctly.

These usually resolve themselves within 30 minutes-a few hours.

It looks like there has been a high frequency of ghost games recently. This happened to me at 12:05 or so A.M. today. It was a hard game but we ended up winning the game (i was playing Bard) and i couldnt load the end game stats so i waited and eventually went to bed.
 
This is a game in challenger and its painful to (from what ive seen so far on this forum board) know i probably wont get the LP from that game, hopefully however riot sorts this out soon. I'll just have to wait and see when I'm  back from work later today.

Just won my first promo game for silver 2 then this same thing happened to me couldn't get past the reconnect screen until like an hour had past and know once I'm back on the game we just won isn't in our match history... and there's no tick in the league boards ???? please HELP i don't want to miss my promo cause of some bug..
